```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, message = F)
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(r2d3)

d <- read_csv("svg/svg_elements.csv") %>% 
  filter(svg == "sandy-beach.svg")

r2d3(
  script = "js/infographiq.js", 
  data=d, 
  options = list(
    svg           = "svg/sandy-beach.svg",
    color_default = "black",
    color_hover   = "yellow"))
```
